headline: Analyst Trims Chevron (CVX) Price Target to $179
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is included among the 10 Best Natural Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) manufactures and sells a range of high-quality refined products, including gasoline, diesel, marine and aviation fuels, premium base oil, finished lubricants, and fuel oil additives. On January 2, Citi trimmed its price target on Chevron Corporation […]

headline: Chevron (CVX) Valuation Check After Venezuela Shock Puts Access To Oil Reserves In Focus
summary: The U.S. capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro has pushed Chevron (CVX) into the spotlight, as investors weigh how potential access to Venezuela’s vast oil reserves could affect the company’s business mix and valuation. See our latest analysis for Chevron. That Venezuela driven spike sits against a mixed price backdrop, with a recent 30 day share price return of 4.36% but a slightly negative year to date move, while the 5 year total shareholder return of 105.84% reflects stronger...
